00051 EuropaReactor::EuropaReactor(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg)
00052 :TeleoReactor(arg, false), m_assembly(*this) {
00053   bool found;
00054   std::string nddl;
00055   
00056   // Load the nddl model
00057   boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &cfg = xml_factory::node(arg);
00058   boost::optional<std::string> model = parse_attr< boost::optional<std::string> >(cfg, "model");
00059   
00060   if( model ) {
00061     if( model->empty() )
00062       throw XmlError(cfg, "Attribute model is empty");
00063     nddl = manager().use(*model, found);
00064     if( !found )
00065       throw XmlError(cfg, "Unable to locate model file \""+(*model)+"\"");
00066   } else {
00067     std::string short_nddl = getName().str()+".nddl",
00068       long_nddl = getAgentName().str()+"."+short_nddl;
00069     
00070     nddl = manager().use(long_nddl, found);
00071     if( !found ) {
00072       nddl = manager().use(short_nddl, found);
00073       if( !found ) 
00074         throw ReactorException(*this, "Unbale to locate "+long_nddl+" or "+short_nddl);
00075     }
00076   }
00077   if( !m_assembly.playTransaction(nddl) ) 
00078     throw ReactorException(*this, "Model in "+nddl+" is inconsistent.");
00079   
00080   if( !m_assembly.plan_db()->isClosed() ) {
00081     syslog("WARN")<<"Plan database is not closed:\n\tClosing it now!";
00082     m_assembly.plan_db()->close();
00083   }
00084   
00085   // configure the solver
00086   std::string solver_cfg = parse_attr<std::string>(cfg, "solver");
00087   
00088   if( solver_cfg.empty() ) 
00089     throw XmlError(cfg, "solver attribute is empty");
00090   
00091   m_assembly.configure_solver(solver_cfg);
00092   
00093   // Now extract the agent timelines from the model
00094   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> timelines;
00095   m_assembly.trex_timelines(timelines);
00096   
00097   for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator t=timelines.begin();
00098       timelines.end()!=t; ++t) {
00099     Symbol name((*t)->getName().toString());
00100     EUROPA::LabelStr mode_val;
00101     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId mode = m_assembly.mode(*t);
00102     
00103     if( !mode->isSpecified() )
00104       throw ReactorException(*this, "Mode for timeline "+name.str()+" is not specified.");
00105     else {
00106       EUROPA::DataTypeId type = mode->getDataType();
00107       mode_val = mode->getSpecifiedValue();
00108     }
00109     
00110     if( Assembly::EXTERNAL_MODE==mode_val || Assembly::OBSERVE_MODE==mode_val ) {
00111       use(name, Assembly::OBSERVE_MODE!=mode_val);
00112     } else if( Assembly::INTERNAL_MODE==mode_val ) {
00113       m_assembly.check_default(*t);
00114       provide(name);
00115       if( !isInternal(name) ) {
00116         syslog("WARN")<<"Unable to declare "<<name<<" as Internal\n\tMaking it External.";
00117         use(name);
00118       } else {
00119         m_assembly.internal(*t);
00120       }
00121     } else if( Assembly::IGNORE_MODE==mode_val ) 
00122       m_assembly.ignore(*t);
00123     else {
00124       if( Assembly::PRIVATE_MODE!=mode_val ) {
00125         syslog("WARN")<<"Timeline "<<name<<" mode \""<<mode_val<<"\" is unknown.\n"
00126                       <<"\tI'll assume that it is Private.";
00127       }
00128     }      
00129   }
00130 }
00131 
00132 EuropaReactor::~EuropaReactor() {}

00134 // manipulators 
00135 
00136 void EuropaReactor::notify(Observation const &o) {
00137   m_assembly.setStream();
00138   {
00139     std::pair<EUROPA::ObjectId, EUROPA::TokenId> 
00140        obs = m_assembly.convert(o, true);
00141     
00142     if( obs.second.isId() ) {
00143       obs.second->start()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getCurrentTick()));
00144     } else {
00145       syslog("ERROR")<<"Failed to inject observation "<<o.object()<<'.'<<o.predicate()<<" in europa model";
00146     }
00147   }
00148 }
00149 
00150 void EuropaReactor::handleRequest(goal_id const &g) {
00151   m_assembly.setStream();
00152   {
00153     std::pair<EUROPA::ObjectId, EUROPA::TokenId> 
00154       req = m_assembly.convert(*g, false);
00155     if( req.second.isId() ) {
00156       try {
00157         details::europa_restrict(req.second->start(), g->getStart());
00158         details::europa_restrict(req.second->duration(), g->getDuration());
00159         details::europa_restrict(req.second->end(), g->getEnd());
00160         
00161         m_internal_goals.insert(goal_map::value_type(g, req.second->getKey()));
00162       } catch(DomainExcept const &err) {
00163         syslog("ERROR")<<"Failed to restrict goal "<<g->object()<<'.'
00164           <<g->predicate()<<'['<<g<<"] temporal attrtibutes.";
00165         req.second->discard();
00166       }
00167     } else {
00168       syslog("WARN")<<"Ignored unknown goal "<<g->object()<<'.'<<g->predicate()<<'['<<g<<"].";
00169     }
00170   }
00171 }
00172 
00173 void EuropaReactor::handleRecall(goal_id const &g) {
00174   m_assembly.setStream();
00175   {
00176     goal_map::left_iterator ig = m_internal_goals.left.find(g);
00177     if( m_internal_goals.left.end()!=ig ) {
00178       EUROPA::EntityId ent = EUROPA::Entity::getEntity(ig->second);
00179       m_internal_goals.left.erase(ig);
00180       
00181       if( ent.isId() && EUROPA::TokenId::convertable(ent) ) {
00182         EUROPA::TokenId tok(ent);
00183         
00184         m_assembly.recall(ent);
00185       }
00186     }
00187   }
00188 }
00189 
00190 void EuropaReactor::handleInit() {
00191   m_assembly.setStream();
00192   
00193   // Initialize clock variables
00194   m_assembly.setTickFactor(tickDuration());
00195   m_assembly.setFinalTick(getFinalTick());
00196   m_assembly.clock_advance(getInitialTick());
00197 }
00198 
00199 void EuropaReactor::handleTickStart() {
00200   m_assembly.setStream();
00201   
00202   // Update the clock
00203   m_assembly.clock_advance(getCurrentTick());
00204   m_completedThisTick = false;
00205 }
00206 
00207 bool EuropaReactor::synchronize() {
00208   if( !m_assembly.synchronize() ) 
00209     return false;
00210   return true;
00211 }
00212 
00213 bool EuropaReactor::hasWork() {
00214   m_assembly.setStream();
00215   
00216   return m_assembly.active() 
00217     || !( m_assembly.invalid() || m_completedThisTick ); 
00218 }
00219 
00220 void EuropaReactor::resume() {
00221   m_assembly.setStream();
00222   // Need to do something here
00223   if( m_assembly.resume() ) {
00224     m_completedThisTick = m_assembly.inactive();
00225   } // Need to do a relax here ...
00226 }
